WRITING.TITLE: Boy hits back at girls who attack and molest him on the train
Little girl and her favorite trash man
Woman repeatedly hits man on camera

WRITING.TEXT: ### Description The video, captured in Brisbane, Queensland, appears to show the man being hit over and over again outside a convenience store. According to the man's friend, the girl allegedly began by asking for money from the group. "She mentioned she was from Emerald and my mate replied 'classic emerald'," he said. "This is her reaction to that." The man also suggested that the girl would end up facing no consequences for her actions, given that he was attacked by a girl. "I feel like she won't get in trouble and nothing will happen because she was hitting the guy and it wasn't the other way around," he wrote.

The clip, filmed on CCTV, shows the mother, who suffers from fibromyalgia, standing by her doorway with two men in Middlesbrough, northeast England. A car soon pulls up and the son jumps out after he sees the pair apparently harassing his mother and her toddler granddaughter. The son, who was returning home from football practice, storms up to one of the men and throws a fierce punch to his jaw causing him to fall to the floor. The loud commotion wakes his brother, who was asleep upstairs, and he charges outside. He grabs the fallen man by the scruff of his collar and drags him out of the drive causing his trousers to fall to around his knees.

WRITING.TEXT: The Eminent Emperor Tamarin

She said she felt angry the gang thought they could get away with it and when one of the men on a scooter nearly ploughed into a woman and a baby in its buggy, she decided to leap into action. #8216;I clobbered him with my shopping but he got away, #8217; she told the Northampton Chronicle. #8216;The rest of them were still trying to smash and grab at the jewellery. #8216;I didn #8217;t know what happened next but I just kept swinging my bag. #8217; She went on to describe how she #8216;landed several blows #8217; on the back of one of the robbers and brought him to the ground as he tried to get away on his scooter. The video footage also showed other members of the public pinning down the man who had fallen from one of the scooters just yards away from the jeweller #8217;s. She said now she just wanted to be left in peace and added: #8216;I #8217;m not a hero and it was maybe foolish of me to get involved but somebody had to do something.

Story : What he did was a very cruel thing. Very cruel. Very inhuman, #8221; she told the court, before addressing him directly. #8220;You have so much ahead of you. You're a young kid. You've got college. You got hopes. You got dreams, and you know what, unfortunately, this will follow you, forever. #8221; Despite what happened to her, James saw the teenager as a promising young man who did a stupid thing. She was willing to accept a sentence of 200 hours of community service and a strict 8 p.m. curfew on school days, and 6 p.m. on weekends. Her compassion spared him jail time but on the way out she gave him one last finger-wagging reprimand. The teen was also ordered to pay the grandmother $200 to replace her cell phone that got soaked in the pool.

WRITING.TITLE: Man finds his dog on the street three years after losing him (happy Dog freak out)

WRITING.TEXT: Story: 62-year-old Giorgi Bereziani lost his beloved dog named Jorge in 2015. All this time since then, he was trying to find his beloved companion. He was putting up ads, combing the streets, but all without success. Three years later, the workers of an opera house called the desperate man and said that a dog, looking like his dog, was walking near their building.

Stolen dog freak out recognizing his owner after 2 years

WRITING.TEXT: Story: Two years ago a man in Wisconsin says his dog Chaos was stolen after he asked a friend to watch it, while he was trying to get his life in order. He didn't think he would ever see his precious pooch again until he got a call from an animal services employee who found a stray dog in her driveway. The shelter called him after locating a microchip and he couldn't believe the news. He wasn't sure if Chaos would remember him but after a few moments the pup was overjoyed seeing his owner again.
